column2: "it's nearly half-past three. I must fly. Don't forget about the funeral service
column3: she added, as she put on her coat. The tapers
column4: the black coffin in the middle of the aisle
column5: the nuns in their white-winged coifs
column7: and the poor cowering creature without any teeth
column8: her face all caved in like an old woman's
column9: wondering whether she wasn't really and in fact dead - wondering whether she wasn't already in hell. Goodbye."
